title: beautiful
text: stunning view! quite crowded towards lunch time but otherwise, the place looks so beautiful and you get a nice view of the city as well as the other monuments

title: waiting time
text: tram 28 goes through Lisbon and you will get a nice view of everything. however, if you get on the very first stop in Martim Moinz make sure to plan enough time as there will be a long queue around 10am till 7pm.

title: crowded
text: during day time it is very crowded. in the late afternoon when there are less people it is much nicer to go there and just enjoy the sunset. it is also fun to ride on the electric scooter around that area

title: beautiful view
text: if you want to have a nice view from the city and the bridge go to the castle. you have to pay a little for the entrance but it is worth the money.

title: nice view
text: beautiful district to stroll through the streets. the view up there is stunning. be sure to wear comfortable shoes.

title: worst decision
text: We were walking around Lucerne and saw this asian restaurant selling Ramen and other kind of dishes. It was by far our worst decision! It was instant ramen, Shin Ramen to be precise. And to make it even funnier it costs us 13.- p.p. Shin Ramen can be bought in any supermarket here in Switzerland for about 2CHF. I can only talk about the Ramen dish the other dishes might be better. The cashier couldn’t talk in German and her English wasn’t good as well. She had a hard time to understand us.

title: good place
text: Went to Domodossola for a day trip and we didnt look up any places to eat as we wanted to surprise ourselves. This restaurant has many different Pizzas and dishes to offer. The portion is really huge also delicious! Friendly staff even though they couldnt really understand English but a little German. I can highly recommend this place! For one anti pasti, 3 main dishes and drinks (soft drink and coffee) we paid under 50$ which is in my opinion such a good price for the good quality

title: shopping and food
text: Dam Square has many things to offer from clothing shops to fancy restaurants. They have expensive brands and more affordable prices like Primark. It is a very good spot if you want to go shopping and eat a lot of food. There are some street performers and a lot of pigeons around. Be careful of pickpockets bc it gets really crowded.

title: relaxing
text: Vondelpark is close (15mins) to the Rijks Museum. You can get there by tram or walk. The park is huge and there are good spots to take pictures. A lot of space just to lie around if you don't like ducks do not go close to the pond. If you like a little nature go there for a walk!

title: beautiful
text: Nyhaven is very beautiful and worth visiting when you are in Copenhagen. There are many spots where you can take nice pictures. However, the prices for the drinks and ice cream there is expensive.

title: disappointing
text: i would not recommend going to the little mermaid bc first of all it is not close to central station or nyhaven. it's just crowded and there is not a special history behind the mermaid. if you have a lot of time in copenhagen drive by and take a picture. it is easy to get there by bike though

title: delicious
text: the korean food there was delicious! it pricey though but worth the money. they have many different dishes to offer from instant noodles to korean fried chicken. we didn't have to wait too long for the food and the atmosphere was great. they played kpop which made it more like a korean spot and there were many korean celebrity posters. would recommend to make reservations since it was quite full during dinner time.

title: fantastic!
text: 5 mins walk from the central station and about 10 mins bike to the main shopping road. urban house has a bar, bike rental, laundry, lobby..everything you need for an interrail trip. Room was clean and spacious!

title: quite small
text: on our walk we passed by and though we should go inside if it's free. it's quite small and nothing extraordinary..i guess if you know a little about the history it can be interesting to go there.

title: high expectations
text: when you hear Paris you think about the Eiffel Tower. lower your expectations bc it is not that special and it does not look nice at all if you go up close. there are many people around it and street vender. from the distance you can get nice photos with the Eiffel Tower in the background.

title: crowded
text: notre dame is right next to the metro station which is convenient. if you go there in the late afternoon (golden hour) you can get nice photos with notre dame in the background. be careful of pickpockets and crowded place

title: nice jardin
text: while looking for a good restaurant we passed by the Jardin du Luxemburg and though we should check it out. Jardin is huge and looks very beautiful! Worth a visit and good for walking

title: beautiful at night
text: came there when it was almost dark already but Louvre still looks very nice and beautiful. didn't go inside though and wouldn't bother to go inside because there are a lot of people there. place around Louvre is amazing..you can see the Eiffel Tower if you walk a little further

title: high-end to affordable shops
text: champs-elysees is a long street and ends with l'arc de triomphe. good place to shop and eat. totally worth a visit just mind that there are a lot of people there

title: beautiful sunset/sunrise view
text: If you want to get a good view from the city and barcode I highly recommend to go the Opera. It is very close to the Central Station. The sunset is very beautiful and the architecture looks different and special. However, we did not go inside..

title: different
text: The structure of the buildings looks like a barcode and from the Opera rooftop you have a great view to Barcode. Even though they were still building and some places were under construction it looks different and interesting.

title: hmm
text: if you are by the Opera you'll see She Lies in the water. However, I would not go there if the Opera was not right next to it. Not something spectacular..

title: huge museum
text: usually I'm not a type of person who would go into a museum however I really enjoyed it. there are many things to see and to learn. it was very interesting! if you go there plan about 2.5-3h bc there is a lot to see and the museum is quite big. right in front of the museum there is the I Amsterdam sign and there is a park close by. Good place to spent a day if you are interested in art

title: nice station
text: the station looks very good and clean. there are many staff members to ask if you have any question or don't know the direction (normal hours idk if they are available at night too). one thing i really like about this station is that there are different restaurants even though i think the food is a little pricey there you have many options. also the supermarket (to go) offers fresh food and has good opening hours for early and late travellers. if you want to shop a little there are also good clothing, make up and souvenir shops for last minute gifts.

title: passing by
text: i really didn't know what to expect there..my cousin and I thought we should go to the redlight district since it is so well known in Amsterdam. We went during the afternoon there were some police officers walking around and some older men standing around the windows. We thought we would see more as we heard from other ppl I guess it is more "alive" at night. wouldn't go there if it wasn't close to the central though

title: awful - do not recommend
text: our group has been traveling for some time and stayed at different hostels. Anker is so far the worst hostel we’ve been to! You have to rent linen and buy for every single thing you want to use. We don’t even have lockers in our room which is very inconvenient. The bathroom is very small for 6 people and everything gets wet bc the shower and toilet are in the same room. Room was not clean when we arrived, stains all over the place and oven was dirty (fat, pizza crumble..idk)! I’m not sure if the room was cleaned after the group before us...even hand soap was empty. Staff were not really friendly and didn’t tell us anything about the hostel or what they have to offer unlike the other hostels. Luckily we are only staying for 2 nights..I really do not recommend this hostel at all!!!!

title: good place to stay for a short time
text: at first we were quite disappointed bc our room (private for 6 travelers) was small and stuffy. However, compared to another hostel CBP was great! They had so many freebies which js very good and makes up the price you pay for the linen you have to rent. The location is very close to metro and bus station. As a group of 6 people we got a quite small room and our bathroom was waaaaay to tiny. Sink was not even big enough to wash your face w/o splashing water everywhere. Also we were right next to the street which meant that we could not open the windows at night. It was too risky and dangerous to keep the windows open. Other than that I dont have anything else to say. You have a great kitchen, free laundry and dryer, free pasta and more..maybe the other rooms were a little bigger nevertheless we had a good stay in Stockholm! Thanks CBP

title: small portions
text: For our little student gathering (7 people) it was a quite crowded. The place is really close to the Zurich main station and also they made it look cozy. Food and service was good and friendly. The portions were in comparison to other places pretty small for example the shrimp taco. That's why I think it was pricey for the small portions. If they gave us bigger portions we wouldn't complain about the price. It's good to have a snack as a student but to fill our stomach it was expensive. However, we all liked to place and staff a lot.

title: delicious
text: At the beginning it was a little bit confusing because they told us to wait until they find us a table even though we made reservations. However, the staff was very nice and friendly. We enjoyed the food and drinks a lot. They were many options to choose even for vegetarians. For us students it was a little bit pricey but it was totally worth it.

title: first recommendation to my friends and family
text: I've been to Vietnam couple times and only with Singapore airlines I'm satisfied. First of all booking the flight online is very simple and the informations are clear und understandable. Secondly the flight attendants are helpful and friendly. Even with simple request they were able to help and came right away when I needed them. Even though I am very picky with my food and do not like airplane food I find Singapore Airlines food enjoyable. They serve it pretty warm and the menu is quite various and have quite a big selection of snacks. Last but not least Singapore Airlines entertainment on the plane is huge. Old and new movies for young and old, from classic to pop music and good games to play. The flight (12h) went by pretty quickly because the entertainment was good. In my opinion is the entertainment important when you do not want to work or sleep on the plane or else it feels like forever. One thing that I do not like are the seats. Even though I am small I think the seats could be a little bit bigger and more leg space would be nice. Nevertheless, I am very satisfied with Singapore Airlines and would recommend it to anyone who wants to fly to Vietnam!

title: Gathering
text: My friends and I (students) would meet once a month. We wanted to find a good place with a mid-range price to eat and have a good time. We went there a few times before just to drink coffee and having a dessert but this time we thought we came to eat lunch. My friend made a reservation and everything went smoothly. Everyone in there stared at us bc we are much younger. Which was a bit strange but we didnt really mind. Service was quite fast at the beginning but we had to wait for some time to finally get our food. It was crowded at lunch time. The main food was delicious and for the price we had to pay good. However, we were disappointed when we ordered chocolate mousse but got hard(!) ice cream instead. The service lady after lunch was a little bit unfriendly. We stayed for some time and had a long chat and it was a good place to stay in and talk and just have a good time over lunch. The service could be friendlier! But we all agreed that the food was great.

title: Definitely coming back
text: Even though the price is a bit more expensive (for broke students) it was worth it. The online reservation went well. It was quite packed around lunch time but around 2pm it was very empty during a weekday(Friday). It was hard to choose bc the menu is huge and everything seems to be good. There are many dishes like pasta, penne, pizza, steak and much more. It took quite some time for the food to arrive but it was very very delicious and we enjoyed it very much. After lunch we stayed in until noon and had drinks and enjoyed our time there. The staff was very friendly and even though it looked stressful they stayed calm and did everything pretty good. We are definitely going back!

title: Great pizza
text: For my friends birthday we went there so eat lunch. She is a very big pizza fan and she liked it a lot. As for me and other 3 friends we enjoyed the pizza as well! The staff was very friendly. We ordered a pizza for a friend who supposed to come 30mins later after that the pizza went cold and the staff offered my friend a new pizza w/o paying extra. Which was very nice. Like other restaurants it was very packed during lunch time and we made reservation which was good idea. The price for the pizza was reasonable. The place is not very easy to find when you dont life in Sursee or knows more about Sursee. Overall it was a very good place to eat and have a good time

title: Totally worth a visit
text: After the Jesus Statue we drove to the lighthouse and the view on the way to th3 lighthouse was amazing. Even when you reach the top the view will still amaze you. But a huge mistake that we made was going there during lunch time when it was crazy sunny and hot. However it was worth the heat because we took amazing pictures.

title: Was okay
text: We expected more..the park and the way to the waterfall was made really nice but you will see a lot of trash and stuff. We went to buy nuoc mia (sugarcane drink) and they said it was very clean and when I pointed out what was not clean (I'm vietnamese) they were sooo mad at me lol but tbh it's not worth it

title: Not bad
text: We were craving rice so we came there to eat. During lunch or dinner time the restaurant is really crowded so you might consider going a little before or after that time. Thats why we had under cooked rice the first time we came. The side dishes were delicious and the service was quite fast too. Therefore if you are craving rice this is a really good spot.

title: Worth a visit
text: If you are in Phu Quoc you should visit the prison. Why? Because it is about Phu Quocs history that's why I think it is worth a visit. However I wouldn't recommend it to families with young children because you will see violence.

title: Not clean
text:
Location for this hotel is pretty good. It is close to the airport and city center. On the opposite side of the hotel there are many shops to rent car (for a day) or motorbikes.
At first the price seems okay but the rooms were not clean when we checked in. Hair on the floor, dirty mirror, dirt on the towel, hair in the sink..and even more. Therefore the price was okay but it was not clean at all. The beds were loud and not soft at all also it was still wet.
Since we knew how to speak vietnamese it waa easy to communicate with the staff and owner but when it came to fill out our documents they had some issues.
Since the hotel isn't the newest anymore the doors are hard to close and the walls dirty and really disgusting.

title: Clean and beautiful
text: In comparison to the other beaches this one was one of the cleanest. It was very quiet because it was faraway from the city and resorts. Due to the weather it was dangerous to swim or go into the water because the waves were very strong. The local people told us that during this time of year the waves are always pretty strong so the best time would be before or after July.

title: Very calm
text: Very big, clean and quiet temple i have been to. The sight from the top of the temple is pretty amazing. On the top everything is green, in the middle the temple and on the bottom there is the sea. Worth a visit!

title: Amazing night view
text: The drinks and food were really really expensive but it's totally worth it for the view. It was kinda hard to get there because you have to go to the first floor to get in but the staff members told us to go down and then up again. So that was confusing since there is no sign like: sky bar or idk. But the staff members are very nice they try to help you.

title: Large place
text: There is nothing special to this place tbh. We went there because it is right next to the Notre dame but the building and the construction is very nice. We didn't explore the inside a lot but there was a picture of Ho Chi Minh inside.

title: Amazing at night
text: There was some kind of festival or show when we went there. So it was really really crowded. The view was really nice because of the lights. Also the atmosphere there was really chill and you'll see a lot of young people. Totally worth a visit in the evening! And if you want to shop there are plenty shops to shop from expensive brand to local thing including food and drinks.
